messages.subject: Thank You - baths and guilt!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, I only get around to checking e-mails about every few days.  Also, I get these e-mails through daily digest.  So, I ve lost track of who I ve responded
messages.messageBody:
Hi all,

I only get around to checking e-mails about every few days. Also, I get these e-mails through daily digest. So, I've lost track of who I've responded to. Anyway, thank you for all the suggestions for both bathing and dealing with guilt.

As I've been less dogmatic about baths/showers the girls have been more willing to take them.

As for quilt, I am working on letting go of the past and focusing on the future. Someone suggested that using guilt as a impetus to change and I liked that perspective. I have found it very helpful

Amy


=


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
